Home » 12S2 Nidānavaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 6 Lābhasakkārasaṃyutta » 6.3 Tatiyavagga
6.3.6 Dutiyasamaṇabrāhmaṇasutta
Lābhasakkārasaṃyutta
Tatiyavagga
Dutiyasamaṇabrāhmaṇasutta
175.
1070Sāvatthiyaṃ viharati. “Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā lābhasakkārasilokassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ nappajānanti…pe…  pajānanti…pe…  sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharantī”ti.
1071Chaṭṭhaṃ.
<< 6.3.5 Samaṇabrāhmaṇasuttaup6.3.7 Tatiyasamaṇabrāhmaṇasutta >>
